name: puretabs
description: Tree tabs extension written in PureScript

scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "spago build --watch" "parcel watch src/background.js src/sidebar.js -d extension/"
scripts.build: spago build && parcel build src/background.js src/sidebar.js -d extension/
scripts.clean: rm -rf .cache .psci_modules modules dist extension/background.js extension/background.js.map extension/sidebar.js extension/sidebar.js.map
